name: Ball Breaker (Zyro)
description:
Break some Balls. Well you break squares but you get the point.
Get the ball to break all squares and progress to the next level.
So jump in and break some squares / balls.

This is a game I made with one of my old classmate for a school project.
This game is 100% free and will stay so forever!

You can find the project source code here: https://github.com/ZyroLUL/BallBreaker/
Note! We providing the source code doesn't mean you allow to copy our project and release it as your own. Also all sprites and music is to this project and this project only.
